implementation_output.changes_summary: Added session_poll_seconds parameter to generate_default_config() with default value of 3, included it in the returned daemon config dict. Verified DEFAULT_PORT is 8720. Added 4 unit tests to verify both acceptance criteria.

results.details: Added session_poll_seconds parameter with default value - backward compatible
Added 4 tests covering both ACs - all tests pass (39/39 in test_config.py, 12/12 in test_cli/test_config_cmd.py)
